channel.title: Spawn object code!
channel.description: ok ive tried like a million things but i cant seem to get the code to PLACE OBJECTS...i dont want the pickup code i want the spawn object code. ;D :| :confused: :o :P :rolleyes: :cool: :eek: :( :mad: :D ;) :)

item.title: Spawn object code!
item.dc:creator: @WonderDude WonderDude
item.description:
@WonderDude wrote:

[code]// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape
spawntimer = 100;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}
[/code]
That’s the one from Project Czar. Just change the item codes and location tbh.

Read full topic
